page.title: 08A Country Park
page.content: The Country Park has lots of tall trees and big fields where we can play. There are two lakes. One is a rectangle shape and is dangerous because it is green and looks like grass, so you could easily mistake it for a play area and fall in. The other is shaped like a banana and has some ducks swimming on it. We call it the Banana Lake. There are lots of wild flowers in the park; in the grounds of the Hall there is a miniature train that anyone can go on and a tunnel that you go under. The Park is good for flying kites and you can play lots of games. James Mason & Leah Murdock
